content: rem 16 19 23 25 27 sts slip first next row knit 9 11 13 15 17 sts onto a stitch holder rejoin yarn to rem commencing with 1st row of 1x1 rib work 6 row 7 8 10 10 10 sts and knit to end cast off in rib work 2 row decrease 1 st at neck edge in both row 5 6 8 8 8 sts next row purl to make up button border join side and armhole border seams sew on buttons see ball band for pressing and care instructions isabella florence william lucy samuel & sofi a jack & jill bobble peep pure - collection one designed by jenny watson arthur bobbins a palette of eight carefully considered solid shades modern twists on classic styles a timeless knitwear range wyspinners com 5 053682 569810 01535 664500 sales@wyspinners com 2 airedale park royd ings avenue keighley west yorkshire bd21 4dg 4000pf pattern originally from bobble peep story book
